Question.Subject: Anybody know how I can fix this problem on netflix?
Question.Content: When I put my instant streaming disc in my ps3 it says "Cannot connect to Netflix. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please visit netflix.com/help on your computer." Well it's been doing this for a while and I went to netflix.com/help and it didn't say anything on how to fix this problem. Anybody know of a way to fix this? my ps3 is definitely connected to the internet. I can still play games online and access the internet.
Question.ChosenAnswer: I would guess that this is because you don't have connectivity on your PS3? Check to make sure that it's connected to the internet.

Answer.Content: I would guess that this is because you don't have connectivity on your PS3? Check to make sure that it's connected to the internet.
